an4.259:1.1: “Catuhi, bhikkhave, angehi samannagato ranno bhadro assajaniyo rajaraho hoti rajabhoggo, ranno anganteva sankham gacchati.
an4.259:1.3: Idha, bhikkhave, ranno bhadro assajaniyo vannasampanno ca hoti balasampanno ca javasampanno ca arohaparinahasampanno ca.
an4.259:1.4: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, catuhi angehi samannagato ranno bhadro assajaniyo rajaraho hoti rajabhoggo, ranno anganteva sankham gacchati.
an4.259:2.1: Evamevam kho, bhikkhave, catuhi dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu ahuneyyo hoti …pe… anuttaram punnakkhettam lokassa.
an4.259:2.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vannasampanno ca hoti balasampanno ca javasampanno ca arohaparinahasampanno ca.
an4.259:3.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu silava hoti …pe… samadaya sikkhati sikkhapadesu.
an4.259:3.3: Evam kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vannasampanno hoti.
an4.259:4.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu araddhaviriyo viharati akusalanam dhammanam pahanaya, kusalanam dhammanam upasampadaya, thamava dalhaparakkamo anikkhittadhuro kusalesu dhammesu.
an4.259:4.3: Evam kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu balasampanno hoti.
an4.259:5.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ‘idam dukkhan’ti yathabhutam pajanati …pe… ‘ayam dukkhanirodhagamini patipada’ti yathabhutam pajanati.
an4.259:5.3: Evam kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu javasampanno hoti.
an4.259:6.3: Evam kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu arohaparinahasampanno hoti.
an4.259:7.1: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, catuhi dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu ahuneyyo hoti …pe… anuttaram punnakkhettam lokassa”ti.
